name: rexlimddvcbv
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, wff w0, wff w1, wff w2, wff w3

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, w1)
-| wi(w0, wrex(s0, c0, w2))
-| wi(w0, wi(wrex(s0, c0, w2), w1))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, w1)
-| wi(w0, wrex(s0, c0, w2))
-| wi(w0, wi(wrex(s0, c0, w2), w1))

stmt.origin: rexlimdvaacbv(s0, s1, c0, w0, w2, w1, w3)
stmt.pretty: rexlimdvaacbv(s0, s1, c0, w0, w2, w1, w3)

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wi(wrex(s0, c0, w2), w1))
-| wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wb(w2, w3))
-| wi(wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s1), c0), w3)), w1)
-| diffsc(s0, c0)
-| diffsc(s1, c0)
-| diffsw(s0, w3)
-| diffsw(s1, w0)
-| diffsw(s1, w2)
-| diffsw(s1, w1)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, w1)
-| wi(w0, wrex(s0, c0, w2))
-| wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wb(w2, w3))
-| wi(wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s1), c0), w3)), w1)
-| diffsc(s0, c0)
-| diffsc(s1, c0)
-| diffsw(s0, w3)
-| diffsw(s1, w0)
-| diffsw(s1, w2)
-| diffsw(s1, w1)

comment: Unpack a restricted existential assumption while changing the variable with implicit substitution. Similar to ~ rexlimdvaacbv . The equivalent of this theorem without the bound variable change is ~ rexlimddv . (Contributed by Rohan Ridenour, 3-Aug-2023.)
